ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Calculate the compliment of the incomplete Gamma function (upper)

DESC.PARA: Calculate the CEPHES function, igamc, in the range [a > 0; x > 0]. The function is defined as
The function, igamc, is defined by
DESC.VERBATIM:
igamc(a,x) = 1 - igam(a,x)
= 1/sqrt(a) Int_(x)^(Inf) e^(-t) t^(a-1) dt
DESC.PARA: In this implementation, both arguments must be positive. The integral is evaluated by either a power series or continued fraction expansion, depending on the relative values of a and x. Arguments can be in scalar or array form.
